app.name: Jatana
app.long_description:
## The future of AI-powered customer service 
 [Jatana](http://www.jatana.ai/?utm_source=z-marketplace&utm_medium=description&utm_campaign=top-link) automates customer service with Machine Learning so that your agents can spend more with the customers that matter most to your business 
 ## Boosting Agent Productivity  
Jatana suggests the best answer to every support request so that your agents don’t have to write it manually every time 
## Reducing Answering Time 
 Set a confidence threshold and Jatana will reply to every support request without the need for a support agent to intervene

## Increasing Customer Satisfaction 
Deliver immediate gratifications to your loyal customers waiting for answers and pave the way for an increase in future sales 

  Join us at [Jatana.ai](http://www.jatana.ai/?utm_source=z-marketplace&utm_medium=description&utm_campaign=top-link) and experience the future of AI-powered customer service
app.installation_instructions:
Installing [Jatana](http://www.jatana.ai/?utm_source=z-marketplace&utm_medium=HowToSetup&utm_campaign=top-link) on your zendesk account is fast and easy, just follow a few simple steps and you are good to go: 

- Click install in the upper right corner of this page
- In the popup window, select the Zendesk account where you would like Jatana to be installed and confirm by clicking the “Install” button
- Now you will be redirected to your Zendesk account (you may be asked to login again if you are not already signed in) 
- Click install to confirm the installation 

Now that Jatana is installed, reach out to our team by sending an email to [getstarted@jatana.ai](mailto:getstarted@jatana.ai) and we’ll enable all the powerful automation features for your account for free.

### APP DETAILS ###
Author: Jatana 

Support: [Email](mailto:support@jatana.ai) / [Website](http://www.jatana.ai/?utm_source=z-marketplace&utm_medium=AppDetails&utm_campaign=support) 

Version: 1.0

token.label: Token from Jatana
token.helpText: While security is our top most priority, we provide you with a secure token from which only you can access your data.
